data.title: Belgium
data.meta_description: The official site for INEOS Belgium.
data.text:
INEOS Belgium

INEOS is one of the largest employers in the Belgian chemical industry. From Zwijndrecht, where INEOS started its first activities in 1998, INEOS built up its position in Belgium and as a global player. In Belgium, INEOS today counts 12 production and R&D sites and 3,150 employees.

Listen to the Project ONE Podcast

Discover insider information from experience experts. Listen to our unique podcast about Project ONE, which zooms in and out of the project simultaneously and continues where media coverage stops.

Read more about Project ONE

Game changer in chemistry since 1998

25 years INEOS is also 25 years of INEOS in Belgium. Because it all started here in 1998. On our 25th anniversary, we take you on a tour of Belgian sites and projects with this magazine. We wish you much reading pleasure!

Read our magazine
